dl.dd: Set this attribute to have the template.XULElem("treecol") element use an image for the header instead of a template.XULAttr("label"). You cannot have both an image and a label displayed in the header. Set this to the URL of an image to appear on the tree column header. If this attribute is left out, no image appears and the label is used instead. The class template.XULStyle("treecol-image") must be used on the template.XULElem("treecol") element for the image to appear. You should still specify a template.XULAttr("label") for use in the column picker if template.XULAttr("ignoreincolumnpicker") is not true and template.XULAttr("hidecolumnpicker") is not true on the template.XULElem("tree").
